授業目的:
Students will Learn various aspects of global warming
1. its cause and effects
2. predicting the future
3. solving global warming
到達目標:
At the end of the semester, students will acquire the following skills.
1. Scanning information
2. Summarising the information they have collected
3. Expressing their own opinions based on their research

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
